hero.title: MAARS
hero.subtitle: Modern Advanced Academic Research System
hero.description: MAARS is a platform that develops digital health solutions to support individuals' social, cognitive, and physical health. With its innovative technologies and human-centered approach, it aims to improve public health and facilitate access to healthcare services.

about.title: What is MAARS?
about.description1: MAARS (Modern Advanced Academic Research System) is an ecosystem that focuses on developing digital health solutions, combining innovative technologies with a human-centered approach. Its primary goal is to protect and strengthen the social, cognitive, and physical health of society.
about.description2: MAARS is not a "single project"; it is an overarching architecture that unifies different projects and field applications under the same methodological language. The platform consists of three main projects: iShe, TERAKKİ, and MUASIR.
about.keyMessage: MAARS is a methodological and system architecture that aims to transfer the experience gained from completed projects to new programs and pilot applications.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To develop a national and sustainable system that improves individuals' quality of life by enabling digital transformation in healthcare services. To achieve transformation in healthcare through artificial intelligence and advanced technologies.

visionContent.title: Our Vision
visionContent.description: To create an exemplary digital health model at national and international levels by ensuring Turkey's leadership in domestic and innovative health technologies.

individual.title: Individual Contribution
individual.description: Enabling people to instantly track their social, cognitive, and physical health, reducing loneliness and depressive symptoms, and providing early diagnosis opportunities.

social.title: Social Benefit
social.description: Reducing inequalities in access to healthcare services through the widespread adoption of digital health services.

national.title: National Gain
national.description: Development of domestic and innovative health technologies, increasing Turkey's competitiveness in the global arena.

whatWeDo.title: What Does MAARS Do?
whatWeDo.intro: The core function of MAARS is to transform data into "knowledge" and "guidance."

guide.title: Produces Guidance

modules.title: Core Modules: iTM
modules.subtitle: Three fundamental projects of the MAARS platform

ishe.title: iShe (Ayşe)
ishe.description: An NLP and LLM-based mobile application developed to increase social interactions of elderly individuals living alone, monitor their cognitive health, and reduce depressive symptoms. Conducted with Ege University Faculty of Medicine Geriatric Clinic.

terakki.title: TERAKKİ
terakki.description: Collection of daily health data through wearable devices and continuous monitoring of individuals' health status. Tracking pulse, blood pressure, and oxygen saturation with smart watches, wristbands, and sensors.

muasir.title: MUASIR
muasir.description: Digital health cabins and advanced imaging systems to facilitate access to healthcare services and provide early diagnosis opportunities. AI-powered diagnosis and data analysis.

ayse.title: Meet: Ayşe
ayse.subtitle: The Face of the iShe Project
ayse.description: Ayşe is the symbol character of the iShe project. Designed as a digital health assistant for our elderly people over 65 who live alone. By chatting with Ayşe, you can take daily cognitive tests, increase your social interaction, and monitor your health status.
ayse.quote: "Technology exists not to leave our elderly alone, but to offer them a better life."

izmir.title: Living Campuses
izmir.description: Aims to develop a living campus model focused on active aging and elderly health with the "Third Age University" approach in Izmir.

yozgat.title: National AI Initiative

q1.question: Is MAARS an institution or a project?
q1.answer: MAARS is an overarching digital health ecosystem that unifies multiple projects and programs under the same methodological framework.

q2.question: What are iShe / TERAKKİ / MUASIR?
q2.answer: They are core modules of MAARS (iTM). iShe focuses on cognitive health of elderly individuals, TERAKKİ on health tracking with wearable devices, and MUASIR on digital health kiosks and early diagnosis.

q3.question: Is iShe (Ayşe) finished?
q3.answer: Yes. iShe is a project conducted and completed under TÜBİTAK 1002-A (324S300). The Ayşe character is the symbol of this project.

q4.question: Who is Ayşe?
q4.answer: Ayşe is the conversation-based AI assistant of the iShe project. Designed to increase social interactions of elderly individuals living alone and monitor their cognitive health.

q5.question: Who do you collaborate with?
q5.answer: Pilot studies and research partnerships are targeted with academic institutions (Ege University, Dokuz Eylül University, etc.), local governments, health institutions, and technology teams.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: MAARS is a living system that develops through pilot applications and research collaborations. You can contact us for institutional collaborations and joint projects.
